fǎnyìng to react; to respond; reaction; response; reply; chemical reaction

yìyì meaning; significance

shìyè undertaking; project; activity; (charitable, political or revolutionary) cause; publicly funded institution, enterprise or foundation

traditional: 起義
qǐyì uprising; insurrection; revolt

zīběnzhǔyì capitalism

bìyào necessary; essential; indispensable; required
bìyāo necessary

fǎndòng reaction; reactionary
